name: Try to create a Sales Lead Appointment with a CIF Key that is too long

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier
And I have confirmed a Customer with a cif Key "0100000933079696000"
And I have authenticated the Customer to authentication level 1

When I create a sales lead appointment for a customer with values:
| cifKey | contactStaffID | interestedInProduct | noteText | scheduleDate | appointmentStartTime | appointmentEndTime |
| 01000009330796960000 | 83018 | Regular Savings | Another Appointment Test Note | next_week | 09.00 | 09.30 |

children.description: Create sales lead appointment: | cifKey | contactStaffID | interestedInProduct | noteText | scheduleDate | appointmentStartTime | appointmentEndTime | | 01000009330796960000 | 83018 | Regular Savings | Another Appointment Test Note | next_week | 09.00 | 09.30 |

testSteps.description: Then I should receive an Forbidden Error

userStory.storyName: Create Sales Lead Appointment for customer

title: Try to create a Sales Lead Appointment with a CIF Key that is too long

tags.name: Create Sales Lead Appointment for customer
